description: Huevos rancheros make for a delicious and healthy breakfast or brunch dish.
keywords: Tortilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Breakfast Huevos Rancheros Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium red onions, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large pan to medium high, add half the oil and half the onion and fry for 2-3 minutes, add the spices, diced capsicum and black beans (including the water) and fry for 2 more minutes. Cook for 15 minutes on medium heat until bubbling and slightly reduced.
Make a quick salsa with the remaining diced onion, half the coriander, lime juice and chopped tomatoes.
Add the remaining oil to a non-stick pan on medium heat and fry to your liking. Warm the tortillas for 30 seconds in the microwave.
Place each tortilla on a plate, spread with the black bean mix, top with an egg, a spoonful of salsa and the sliced avocado. Scatter with chopped coriander and serve.
